---
title: "Interactive Bash via Binder + Thebe"
description: "Quarto page with a live Bash shell v2"
---


Click **Live Code** → then the **Run** ▶️ button in the cell.  
This starts a Binder session that runs a **Bash Jupyter kernel**.

::: {#0f86b19e .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.bash .cell-code}
# Try a few shell commands:
uname -a
pwd
ls -la
echo "Hello from Bash on Binder!"
```
:::
